channel.title: Cornerstone to Recovery
channel.description: "Cornerstone To Recovery" is a bi-weekly Christian talk show supporting those who are healed or recovering from any type of addiction.The show is hosted by Pastor Tom Nelson.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2010 Cornerstone To Recovery and Tom Nelson
channel.itunes:subtitle: Addiction Recovery Support
channel.itunes:summary: "Cornerstone To Recovery" is a bi-weekly Christian talk show supporting those who are healed or recovering from any type of addiction. The show is hosted by Pastor Tom Nelson.
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Tom Nelson
channel.itunes:keywords: addiction, Recovery, Addiction Recovery, 12 Steps, christian recovery, christian, self help, help, support, addict, recover, addicted
